title: A Soldier in Love
description: Michelle is tough, Earth Army tough. She has given up her life as a schoolteacher to fight for her planet which is being invaded by frightening creatures. The Earth Army sends her to a planet reminiscent of Hell. Somewhere along the way, she meets a scarred Baat warrior with a secret. Will his secret be too much for her to bear? Why does he make her question where it is in the universe she belongs? How long can she keep fighting for?
author: A. Petrov
